foody_purpose: Foody is here to help us take better care of our planet through our food choices.
idea: The idea is to give consumers a glimpse of the environmental impact of their meal options when confronted with selecting their next meal.
foody_function: Foody is a tool for all kinds of meal creators to evaluate the environmental impact of their meals and present that information for their consumers.
main_function: Foody determines the environmental impact of meals, with regards to land use, greenhouse gas emissions, water withdrawals and eutrophying emissions.
